content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in New York. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Hello, Hassan. It's a pleasure to meet you. I'm sure you'll find my apartment quite comfortable and suitable for your needs. Let's discuss the rental price. What would you be willing to pay for such a prime location in the heart of the city?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: Thank you, Mister Heine. The location is indeed excellent. As a student, I'm looking for a place that is both affordable and convenient. I would like to propose a price that reflects this. How about 1,200 Euro per month?
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Hmm, 1,200 Euro per month is a very reasonable offer, considering the size and location of the apartment. However, as a landlord, I'm always looking to maximize my gains. Would you be willing to negotiate a bit higher? Perhaps 1,300 Euro per month? This would still represent a great value for you, considering the amenities and the neighborhood.
name: Heinrich Heine

content: Thank you for considering my offer. Your suggestion of 1,300 Euro per month is certainly closer to what I can afford. However, as a student, every euro counts. Would it be possible to meet in the middle at 1,250 Euro per month? This would be a fair compromise, I believe.
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: You're quite right, Hassan. As a student, every euro does count. And you've made a compelling argument. I'm willing to accept your offer of 1,250 Euro per month as a fair compromise. I'm sure you'll enjoy your stay in the apartment and the convenience of the location. Shall we proceed with the paperwork?
name: Heinrich Heine
